channel.title: CVE Feed for gelform -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gelform -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3555|2024-08-01T20:12:07.673Z -- gelform -- social%20link%20pages%3A%20link-in-bio%20landing%20pages%20for%20your%20social%20media%20profiles
item.description: The Social Link Pages: link-in-bio landing pages for your social media profiles plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the import_link_pages() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.6.9. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary pages and malicious web scripts.

item.title: CVE-2024-3555|2024-06-04T17:31:56.645Z -- gelform -- social%20link%20pages%3A%20link-in-bio%20landing%20pages%20for%20your%20social%20media%20profiles
item.description: The Social Link Pages: link-in-bio landing pages for your social media profiles plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the import_link_pages() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.6.9. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary pages and malicious web scripts.
